alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 9:08PM CDT until April 15 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn affecting Bienville, Webster and Bossier Parishes. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill, Dixie Inn, Lake Bistineau...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat At Dixie Inn. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 16.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Monday was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The bayou is expected to fall below flood stage Friday morning and continue falling to 12.9 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.9 feet on 05/07/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Tuesday evening at 915 PM CDT.
